name: RESTLESS ROOM
description:
DEV LOG


Strategically activate the traps and dodge the explosions, arrows, and beams that threaten your life!

WASD to move

Spacebar to make a trap activate faster.

You can delete highscore data by pressing P while Q and B are pressed.

All assets are made for this game by Divagated (except for the font, which was made by Divagated, but not for this game)

Made for ScoreSpace Jam #13

https://itch.io/jam/scorejam13

@me in my discord: 

https://discord.gg/TCyHkAR
